message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our product to you. It is an exceptional opportunity that aligns well with your needs and expectations. We believe its value to you is $1000000. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, we are proposing to sell it to you for $950000. This offer is designed to ensure both parties benefit from this transaction. Please let us know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
